#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<vector>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,m,i,a,b,x,y;

    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        map<int,vector<int> > def;
        map<int,vector<int> > win;
        map<int,bool> inv;

        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);

            x = min(a,b);
            y = max(a,b);
            def[y].push_back(x);
            win[x].push_back(y);
        }

        int pt3 = -1;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            if(win[i].size()==n-i && def[i].size()==0)
            {
                inv[i]=1;
                pt3 = i;
            }
        if(pt3!=-1)
            printf("2 %d\n",pt3);
        else
        {
            for(i=n;i>0;i--)
            {
                bool win = 1;
                for(int j=0;j<def[i].size();j++)
                {
                    int k = def[i][j];
                    if(inv[k]==1)
                        win=0;
                }
                if(win==1)
                    break;
            }
            if(i!=0)
                printf("1\n");
            else
                printf("0\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
